remarks:
A double syllogism inference.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 20-Apr-2011.) 

---

 Virtual deduction rule.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 20-Apr-2011.)
statement:
sylsyld.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
sylsyld.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
sylsyld.3 $e |- ( ps -> ( th -> ta ) ) $.
sylsyld $p |- ( ph -> ( ch -> ta ) ) $.
